outputs.output_descr: The project support the deepening of the Human Development paradigm, production of national human development reports and promotion of dialogue on human development through national development fora. Support is also provided towards capacity development for Millennium Development Goals-based planning for planners at the provincial and district level.

project_descr: Support for pro-poor policy formulation, implementation and monitoring and evaluation at the MInistry of Finance and Planning and University of Zambia.
